Html:
Hi everyone!
I have small a problem!
I start new project and added a few images in project.
Also I added text in home.xaml: <Image Source="test.png" Height="100" Width="100"/>

But this code doesn't work and I don't why, although in WPF project without MUI this code work correct!

Thanks a lot!
Odd. Are you sure the build action for the image resources is set correctly? Otherwise, care to share some source code?

Omg!

Sorry. You are right!

I just forgot about properties for images. There it was established the Content.

Thanks!
